snippet: A bit of art will be injected into Taxi TV, and the Neue Galerie will open soon “German Expressionism 1900-1930,” an exhibition of works from its own collection.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; around 3,000 New York City taxis will begin featuring art video by Ryan McGinley; Neue Galerie follows wave of popular Expressionist enthusiasm and will open exhibit German Expressionism 1900-1930 in February; influential art fairs, including Armory Show, are up for sale and rumored to become part of Louise Blouin's stable of art properties.
lead_paragraph: A bit of art will be injected into Taxi TV, and the Neue Galerie will open soon “German Expressionism 1900-1930,” an exhibition of works from its own collection.

headline.seo: Art Comes to Taxi TV; ‘German Expressionism’ at Neue Galerie
headline.main: Art’s Ambient Sounds Coming Soon to Taxis
headline.print_headline: Art’s Ambient Sounds Coming Soon to Taxis
